entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
